name: Death Lease
description:
Your brother is missing! Your only clue is the last message you received from him while he was checking in on your most recent lessees. Its now up to you to get in and get him out without getting gotten yourself.

Travel through the house while avoiding the spirits of the previous inhabitants. This can be done by listening and watching out for them and using the house against them. If you are caught, you are dead. So don't not get caught.

Use The House To Survive


Close doors and use lights to keep the enemies at bay while finding the items needed to save your brother.
Or just sit down for a bit, because that actually really does help.

This game features this revolutionary list of new and excited player actions:
  • Use
  • Pick Up
  • Put Down

By using your wits and skills, you can avoid the spirits and save your brother and continue being the best realtors in the business!

Alternatively

Do none of that and just sacrifice your entire head to him. He really likes them.
